answers.text:
One thing it may be helpful for you to consider as you try to make heads and tails of this negotiation is the Affordable Care Act Local Government Toolkit that was written by the US Department of Health and Human Services.  You can review it online, here: http://marketplace.cms.gov/getofficialresources/other-partner-resources/outreach-and-enrollment-toolkit-for-elected-officials.pdf 
I hope that this helps.

author: James Hurley
text:
Hi folks, 
With the new health insurance options, I am looking for information about how local governments are restructuring their employee health insurance plans. We are currently in negotiations with our firefighters and police officers, so if anyone has a copy of their current contract or related resources then I would greatly appreciate it. Particularly, any language about rate structures, insurance carriers, or new requirements.
title: Health Insurance Benefits for Public Employees
